If this is a bug report, make sure you are able to reproduce it with the latest PowerShellGet module from master branch.
- Search the [existing issues](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShellGet/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aissue).
- Fill out the following template:

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate on the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------
```powershell
# ModuleName = "Sample"
# Module manifest "Sample.psd1" contains ModuleVersion = '1.0.0'
$Version = [version]'1.0.1' # new version, build number changed from 0 to 1

# Module manifest "Sample.psd1" was copied to folder ".\bin\1.0.1" along with "Sample.psm1" 
Update-ModuleManifest -Path ".\bin\$Version\Sample.psd1" -ModuleVersion $Version
```
Expected behavior
-----------------

Value of ModuleVersion property in the module manifest should change

```none

```

Actual behavior
---------------
Throws an error and suggest exactly what I'm trying to do...
```none
Update-ModuleManifest : Cannot update the manifest properly. 'The ModuleVersion key in module manifest 'C:\Sample\bin\1.0.1\Sample.psd1' specifies module version '1.0.0' which does not match its version folder name at 'C:\Sample\bin\1.0.1'. Change the value of the ModuleVersion key to match the version folder name.'
```

comments.author: edyoung
comments.body:
This happens because Update-ModuleManifest calls Test-ModuleManifest internally, which throw a terminating error when:
- the .psd1 file is in a directory with with a numeric name (say 1.0)
- the module version in the manifest does not equal the version of the directory it is in. 

I think the fix is to change https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/Modules/TestModuleManifestCommand.cs#L274 to WriteError instead of ThrowTerminatingError. 

Since this is a relatively small issue I don't have time to make a fix right now but please feel free to propose a PR.

title: Test-ModuleManifest won't return a moduleinfo for a .psd1 where versions mismatch
